content:
The top pane displays the **Current racer**, as well as the **Current lap time** and the **Time left** in the current race. Information about previous runs is available in **Data from previous runs**. The middle pane displays information from previous runs. The bottom pane displays the **Fastest racer** and the **Slowest racer**.

AWS DeepRacer commentators use the information presented here to provide quick and timely commentary during races.
